If a creature you control attacked this turn,

EXPLORE_SENTENCE: it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Lands go to your hand; nonlands give this creature a +1/+1 counter, then you may leave that card on top or put it into your graveyard.)
TREASURE_SENTENCE: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this: Add one mana of any color.")
DINO_FIGHT: this creature fights up to one target creature you don't control.
PIRATE_TEMPO: tap up to one target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
MERFOLK_COUNTERS: put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Merfolk you control.
CITIES_BLESSING_BONUS: If you have the city's blessing, put two +1/+1 counters on that creature instead.
